screen_desc: The screenshot shows a product page for a 2017 Apple MacBook Air on Amazon. It displays details about the laptop, including its specifications (Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, 128GB SSD), condition (refurbished), and price of $390.00. The shipping cost to the Netherlands is also shown, with an estimated delivery date of November 14. There is an option to explore the Amazon Renewed Store and an icon indicating the product is Climate Pledge Friendly.
